title: The Velveteen rabbit
creator_credit: Billy Budd Films and Pierre Veck
brief_description: A stop-frame animated version of Margery Williams classic children’s tale of a toy rabbit’s longing to become “real”. Through the love of a boy and a little nursery magic his dream comes true. Music from Vivaldi’s “Four Seasons”.
description: A stop-frame animated version of Margery Williams classic children’s tale of a toy rabbit’s longing to become “real”. Through the love of a boy and a little nursery magic his dream comes true. Music from Vivaldi’s “Four Seasons”.
